TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem ToolboxItemCreatorCallback(object serializedObject, string format);
.class public auto ansi sealed ToolboxItemCreatorCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ToolboxItemCreatorCallback(serializedObject As Object, format As String) As ToolboxItem
public delegate System::Drawing::Design::ToolboxItem ^ ToolboxItemCreatorCallback(System::Object ^ serializedObject, System::String ^ format);
type ToolboxItemCreatorCallback = delegate of obj * string -> ToolboxItem

param.name: serializedObject
param.span: 物件，包含要為之建立 的資料。

span.span: The object which contains the data to create a for.

param.name: format
param.span: 要為之建立 的剪貼簿資料格式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the clipboard data format to create a for.

summary.span: 提供可以建立 的回呼 (Callback) 機制。

span.span: Provides a callback mechanism that can create a .

returns.span: 所指定之還原序列化的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用比對方法簽章建立工具箱項目放在工具箱上特定的剪貼簿資料格式的所有物件的這個委派類型的方法簽章來實作工具箱項目建立者方法。You can implement a toolbox item creator method with a method signature matching the method signature of this delegate type that creates a toolbox item from any object of a particular clipboard data format placed on the toolbox. 比方說，您可以在此設計會建立 工具箱 項目建立者來儲存從剪貼簿貼上至工具箱 中的文字。For example, you can design a toolbox item creator that creates a to store text pasted to the toolbox from the clipboard. 您可以使用方法以新增工具箱 中的特定資料類型的事件處理常式。You can use the method of the to add a event handler for a particular data type to the toolbox. `serializedObject`參數包含的資料物件。The `serializedObject` parameter contains the data object. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例提供使用的元件加入"Text"的資料格式處理常式或，至工具箱。The following example provides a component that uses the to add a "Text" data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 資料的建立者回呼委派會傳遞任何的文字資料貼到工具箱 中，並拖曳到表單上的自訂來建立包含文字。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)]
